alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 8:39PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Across Coastal Volusia and Coastal Brevard Counties this Evening... At 8:37 PM, surface observations and traffic cameras showed patchy dense fog occurring across Coastal Volusia and Coastal Brevard counties. Any locally dense fog will reduce visibilities to less than a mile at times through at least 12 AM. Drivers should prepare to encounter rapid visibility reductions this evening. When driving in fog, slow down, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
